name: Very Nice Plant People
description: Though they came back from the brink of extinction, the Phylosians are still dealing with chronic effects from the disease that almost destroyed them. But is their request for research help actually covered in thorns?
rules:
-- In a Specialist Event, you will select crew to engage in Specialist Missions.
-- Only a single crew with corresponding skills can be assigned to a Specialist Mission. After the mission is completed, that crew will be disabled from doing Specialist Missions for some period of time.
-- Specialist Missions take time to complete. The higher selected crew skills are the less time it will take them to complete a mission.
-- Only the highest skill of a crew is considered when calculating time to complete a mission.
-- Using crew with matching Specialist Mission bonus traits will significantly decrease time needed to complete a mission.
-- Each time a Specialist Mission is completed, some progress is also gained on the Main Mission. Completing the Main Mission rewards substantial amounts of Event Victory Points.
-- Using any version of Stavos, Agmar, Arex, Botanists, or Gardeners will provide a chance to gain bonus progress on the Main Mission.
-- When you fail to gain bonus progress on the Main Mission using featured crew or crew with matching event bonus traits, the bonus progress chance goes up slightly the next time you use such crew in a mission. If you score the bonus progress, the bonus chance amount goes back to its initial value. 
-- You earn Event Victory Points each time you complete a Specialist Mission or the Main Mission. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Stavos, Agmar, Arex, Botanists, Gardeners
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Specialist Missions!

featured_crew.name: Booker
featured_crew.flavor: An artificial intelligence in the form of Archivist Booker helps Burnham pass the Labyrinth of the Mind test.

action.name: Be Able To Be Honest With Yourself

featured_crew.name: Agmar
featured_crew.flavor: A representative of a race of intelligent plants and the primary contact with the crew of U.S.S. Enterprise.

featured_crew.name: Arex
featured_crew.flavor: Navigator aboard the Enterprise, Arex found himself playing his lute under the influence of a love potion.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Boothby
rewards.flavor: Groundskeeper of Starfleet Academy for decades, Boothby's advice was sought by generations of cadets.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Navigator aboard the Enterprise, Arex found himself playing his lute under the influence of a love potion.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Booker
rewards.flavor: An artificial intelligence in the form of Archivist Booker helps Burnham pass the Labyrinth of the Mind test.

main_mission.title: To Bloom Once More
main_mission.description: Find a treatment for the Phylosians' lingering conditions.

goals.flavor: Pursue order and progress with the Dominion.

potential_rewards.name: Dominion Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Dominion faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.
